title: Udonis Haslem | Ep 77 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Udonis Haslem | Ep 77 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
18-year NBA vet Udonis Haslem joins Matt and Stak to discuss his long, storied career. Haslem shares stories about a young Dwyane Wade, Shaq and Miami's Big 3 years with Lebron, Wade and Chris Bosh. Plus, he talks current Heat and his bond with Jimmy Butler.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
